${ModID}:GreyBargain.NAME: Grey Bar获得
${ModID}:GreyBargain.DESCRIPTION: Return a ${ModID}:Buried card to your 抽牌堆 by 消耗ing 一张牌 in your hand。
${ModID}:GreyBargain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Return a ${ModID}:Buried card to your 抽牌堆 by 消耗ing 一张牌 in your hand. NL 抽一张牌。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I need 一张牌 to 消耗 。

${ModID}:ExtraLimbs.NAME: Extra Limbs
${ModID}:ExtraLimbs.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害 !M! 次。 NL When 消耗ed, increase the number of hits by 1 本场战斗. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:AncientSpear.NAME: Ancient Spear
${ModID}:AncientSpear.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:FleshLikeOak.NAME: Flesh Like Oak
${ModID}:FleshLikeOak.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 获得 !M! 点 力量 。 NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:CallOfTheGrave.NAME: Call of the Grave
${ModID}:CallOfTheGrave.DESCRIPTION: 你的回合开始时， play a random ${ModID}:Buried card 并stslib:Purge it。
${ModID}:CallOfTheGrave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 NL 你的回合开始时， play a random ${ModID}:Buried card 并stslib:Purge it。

${ModID}:SpontaneousRitual.NAME: Spontaneous Ritual
${ModID}:SpontaneousRitual.DESCRIPTION: 消耗 your hand. NL Deal damage equal to the number of cards 消耗ed 本场战斗。
${ModID}:SpontaneousRitual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add 3 *Dazed to your h并then 消耗 it. NL Deal damage equal to the number of cards 消耗ed 本场战斗。

${ModID}:FuneraryJewels.NAME: Funerary Jewels
${ModID}:FuneraryJewels.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 抽 !M! 张牌。 获得 [E] 。 NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:Tombstone.NAME: Tombstone
${ModID}:Tombstone.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:DarkOfNight.NAME: Dark of Night
${ModID}:DarkOfNight.DESCRIPTION: Your next card that 消耗s 本回合 is played twice。
${ModID}:DarkOfNight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next two cards that 消耗 本回合 are played twice。

${ModID}:LastGasp.NAME: Last Gasp
${ModID}:LastGasp.DESCRIPTION: 虚无 。 NL Choose a ${ModID}:Buried card, play it, 并stslib:Purge it。
${ModID}:LastGasp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a ${ModID}:Buried card, play it, 并stslib:Purge it。
